price: Gabroota kiyyatti odeessi Ani Anumatu araaramaa, rahmata godhaadhaa.
arabic: ۞ نَبِّئۡ عِبَادِيٓ أَنِّيٓ أَنَا ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: nabbi ʿibādī annī anā al-ghafūru al-raḥīmu
